title: How to Make Gluten Free Almond Butter Blondies

steps.headline: Mix almond butter in a large bowl with a hand blender until it's creamy.
Mix in the agave nectar and eggs.
Add the salt and baking soda.
Mix well with a hand blender or an electrical blender on low speed until all ingredients are thoroughly combined.
Mix half of the chocolate into the batter.
Pour the batter into a well greased 9 * 13 inch (33.0 cm) Pyrex baking dish.
Scatter the other half of the chocolate onto the top of the batter.
Allow to cool and then serve.

text: Preheat the oven to 325 °F (163 °C).  Mix almond butter in a large bowl with a hand blender until it's creamy.  Mix in the agave nectar and eggs.  Add the salt and baking soda.  Mix well with a hand blender or an electrical blender on low speed until all ingredients are thoroughly combined.  Mix half of the chocolate into the batter.  Pour the batter into a well greased 9 * 13 inch (33.0 cm) Pyrex baking dish.  Scatter the other half of the chocolate onto the top of the batter.  Bake for 35 minutes.  Allow to cool and then serve.
